channel.title: Switching Prayer Books

item.title: Switching Prayer Books
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay so i added the ancient curses interface and i would like the make the chaos alter (object ID 411) switch between the two prayer books normal and ancient ones, i have this but i only lets me do it once once i click pray chaos alter is switches to curses then i click it again and switches back to normal and then if i try and click it again it doesn’t do anything here’s my code all help is appreciated thanks

[code]

if (objectID == 411) { if (playerAncientCurses == 0) { setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); playerAncientCurses = 1; } else if (playerAncientCurses == 1) { setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); playerAncientMagics = 0; } }
I have this also I’m not sure how to explain what part of client.java it’s in but it’s where it declares the sidebar interfaces.

if (playerAncientCurses == 0) { setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); playerAncientMagics = 0; } if (playerAncientCurses == 1) { setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); playerAncientMagics = 1; }

Read full topic
